name: Georges Invaders
description:
Georges Invaders is a shoot them up game. 

It takes place in the Georges Méliès' movie universe (Le Voyage dans la Lune,  1902).

In order to conquer the Moon, the player must complete different missions by crossing various obstacles.

Credits :

Exercice Ecole Georges Méliès

Maria Feranda Berguerand

Simon Cheillan

Mathilde Degris

Arthur Grousset
